## TypesettingUtils.computeGlyphTransform() function

Computes the transformation matrix for a glyph.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function computeGlyphTransform(transform: THREE.Matrix3, position: THREE.Vector3, scale: number, rotation: number, localRotation: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  transform | THREE.Matrix3 | Matrix used to store the results. |
|  position | THREE.Vector3 | Glyph' position. |
|  scale | number | Glyph' scale. |
|  rotation | number | \[\[TextCanvas\]\] rotation. |
|  localRotation | number | Glyph' local rotation. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
